# Environment Variables

This package uses environment variables. The schema for these variables is as follows:

| Variable                    | Description                 | Type   | Required |
| --------------------------- | --------------------------- | ------ | -------- |
| AZURE_HOT_BLOB_STORAGE_URL  | The Azure Blob Storage URL. | string |          |
| AZURE_COOL_BLOB_STORAGE_URL | The Azure Blob Storage URL. | string |          |
| AZURE_COLD_BLOB_STORAGE_URL | The Azure Blob Storage URL. | string |          |
| AZURE_CLIENT_ID             | The Azure Client ID.        | string | Yes      |
